cause.description:
Marriage for everyone. PLease do not join if you disagree with the cause. If you think that everyone should be lucky enough to marry, please do join.
1. Marriage is not only between a man and a woman.
2. The exclusion of homosexuals and lesbians to marriage is unethical and predjudice.
3. Anyone can have the choice to marry.
cause.mission: Accept marriage as something that can be valued by all people, whether straight, gay or lesbian and so on.
cause.name: Marriage: Let's Include Everyone
